name: Using SEMANTICKEYPHRASETABLE (semantic search) - Unsupported in Azure SQL Database

platformMigration.description: Using semantic search (SEMANTICKEYPHRASETABLE) is not a supported function in Azure SQL Database. It should be removed or replaced by an equivalent function or service supported in Azure. When used on on-premise SQL databases, this function returns a table with zero, one, or more rows for key phrases associated with the specified columns in the specified table. This rowset function can be referenced in the FROM clause of a SELECT statement as if it were a regular table name.
